verses.verse: אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> Whoso loveth מ֭וּסָר <WH4148> instruction אֹ֣הֵֽב <WH157> loveth דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וְשֹׂנֵ֖א <WH8130> but he that hateth תוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> reproof בָּֽעַר׃ <WH1197> be brutish

ט֗וֹב <WH2896> A good יָפִ֣יק <WH6329> [man] obtaineth רָ֭צוֹן <WH7522> favour מֵיְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> but a man מְזִמּ֣וֹת <WH4209> of wicked devices יַרְשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH7561> will he condemn

לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> shall not be established אָדָ֣ם <WH120> A man בְּרֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> by wickedness וְשֹׁ֥רֶשׁ <WH8328> but the root צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> of the righteous בַּל־ <WH1077> lest יִמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> shall not be moved

אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> woman חַ֭יִל <WH2428> A virtuous עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> [is] a crown בַּעְלָ֑הּ <WH1167> to her husband וּכְרָקָ֖ב <WH7538> [is] as rottenness בְּעַצְמוֹתָ֣יו <WH6106> in his bones מְבִישָֽׁה׃ <WH954> but she that maketh ashamed

מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> The thoughts צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> [are] right תַּחְבֻּל֖וֹת <WH8458> [but] the counsels רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> [are] deceit

דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> The words רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked אֱרָב־ <WH693> [are] to lie in wait דָּ֑ם <WH1818> for blood וּפִ֥י <WH6310> but the mouth יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> of the upright יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <WH5337> shall deliver
הָפ֣וֹךְ <WH2015> are overthrown רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> The wicked וְאֵינָ֑ם <WH369> no וּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> and [are] not but the house צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> shall stand

לְֽפִי־ <WH6310> according שִׂ֭כְלוֹ <WH7922> to his wisdom יְהֻלַּל־ <WH1984> shall be commended אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> A man וְנַעֲוֵה־ <WH5753> but he that is of a perverse לֵ֝֗ב <WH3820> heart יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָבֽוּז׃ <WH937> shall be despised

ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] better נִ֭קְלֶה <WH7034> [He that is] despised וְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> and hath a servant ל֑וֹ מִ֝מְּתַכַּבֵּ֗ד <WH3513> than he that honoureth וַחֲסַר־ <WH2638> himself and lacketh לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> [man] regardeth צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> A righteous נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> the life בְּהֶמְתּ֑וֹ <WH929> of his beast וְֽרַחֲמֵ֥י <WH7356> but the tender mercies רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked אַכְזָרִֽי׃ <WH394> [are] cruel

עֹבֵ֣ד <WH5647> He that tilleth אַ֭דְמָתוֹ <WH127> his land יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <WH7646> shall be satisfied לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> with bread וּמְרַדֵּ֖ף <WH7291> but he that followeth רֵיקִ֣ים <WH7386> vain חֲסַר־ <WH2638> [persons is] void לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of understanding

חָמַ֣ד <WH2530> desireth רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> The wicked מְצ֣וֹד <WH4685> the net רָעִ֑ים <WH7451> of evil וְשֹׁ֖רֶשׁ <WH8328> [men] but the root צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous יִתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> yieldeth

בְּפֶ֣שַׁע <WH6588> by the transgression שְׂ֭פָתַיִם <WH8193> of [his] lips מוֹקֵ֣שׁ <WH4170> is snared רָ֑ע <WH7451> The wicked וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> shall come out מִצָּרָ֣ה <WH6869> of trouble צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> but the just

מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> by the fruit פִי־ <WH6310> of [his] mouth אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> A man יִשְׂבַּע־ <WH7646> shall be satisfied ט֑וֹב <WH2896> with good וּגְמ֥וּל <WH1576> and the recompence יְדֵי־ <WH3027> hands אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> of a man's [יָשׁוּב כ] (יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> break ק) לֽוֹ׃

דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way אֱ֭וִיל <WH191> of a fool יָשָׁ֣ר <WH3477> [is] right בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his own eyes וְשֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> but he that hearkeneth לְעֵצָ֣ה <WH6098> unto counsel חָכָֽם׃ <WH2450> [is] wise
אֱוִ֗יל <WH191> A fool's בַּ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> is presently יִוָּדַ֣ע <WH3045> known כַּעְס֑וֹ <WH3708> wrath וְכֹסֶ֖ה <WH3680> [man] covereth קָל֣וֹן <WH7036> shame עָרֽוּם׃ <WH6175> but a prudent

יָפִ֣יחַ <WH6315> [He that] speaketh אֱ֭מוּנָה <WH530> truth יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> sheweth forth צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> righteousness וְעֵ֖ד <WH5707> witness שְׁקָרִ֣ים <WH8267> but a false מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> deceit

יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> There is בּ֭וֹטֶה <WH981> that speaketh כְּמַדְקְר֣וֹת <WH4094> like the piercings חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of a sword וּלְשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> but the tongue חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> of the wise מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> [is] health

שְֽׂפַת־ <WH8193> The lip אֱ֭מֶת <WH571> of truth תִּכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> shall be established לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> for ever וְעַד־ <WH5704> is only אַ֝רְגִּ֗יעָה <WH7281> instant לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> but a lying

מִ֭רְמָה <WH4820> Deceit בְּלֶב־ <WH3820> [is] in the heart חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <WH2790> of them that imagine רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil וּֽלְיֹעֲצֵ֖י <WH3289> but to the counsellors שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> of peace שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> [is] joy

לֹא־ <WH3808> not יְאֻנֶּ֣ה <WH579> happen לַצַּדִּ֣יק <WH6662> to the just כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אָ֑וֶן <WH205> There shall no evil וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> but the wicked מָ֣לְאוּ <WH4390> shall be filled רָֽע׃ <WH7451> with mischief

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [are] abomination יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> to the LORD שִׂפְתֵי־ <WH8193> lips שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> Lying וְעֹשֵׂ֖י <WH6213> but they that deal אֱמוּנָ֣ה <WH530> truly רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH7522> [are] his delight

אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man עָ֭רוּם <WH6175> A prudent כֹּ֣סֶה <WH3680> concealeth דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וְלֵ֥ב <WH3820> but the heart כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים <WH3684> of fools יִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> proclaimeth אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <WH200> foolishness

יַד־ <WH3027> The hand חָרוּצִ֥ים <WH2742> of the diligent תִּמְשׁ֑וֹל <WH4910> shall bear rule וּ֝רְמִיָּ֗ה <WH7423> but the slothful תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will be put לָמַֽס׃ <WH4522> shall be under tribute

דְּאָגָ֣ה <WH1674> Heaviness בְלֶב־ <WH3820> in the heart אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of man יַשְׁחֶ֑נָּה <WH7812> maketh it stoop וְדָבָ֖ר <WH1697> word ט֣וֹב <WH2896> but a good יְשַׂמְּחֶֽנָּה׃ <WH8055> maketh it glad

יָתֵ֣ר <WH8446> [is] more excellent מֵרֵעֵ֣הוּ <WH7453> than his neighbour צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> The righteous וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked תַּתְעֵֽם׃ <WH8582> seduceth

לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יַחֲרֹ֣ךְ <WH2760> [man] roasteth רְמִיָּ֣ה <WH7423> The slothful צֵיד֑וֹ <WH6718> not that which he took in hunting וְהוֹן־ <WH1952> but the substance אָדָ֖ם <WH120> man יָקָ֣ר <WH3368> [is] precious חָרֽוּץ׃ <WH2742> of a diligent

בְּאֹֽרַח־ <WH734> In the way צְדָקָ֥ה <WH6666> of righteousness חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> [is] life וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> along נְתִיבָ֣ה <WH5410> path אַל־ <WH408> is no מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> [thereof there is] no death
